department: Department of Public Works and Government Services
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on January 9, 2023. by 2:00pm EST. All bids submitted after 2:00pm EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. This Canadian Coast Guard requirement is for the supply of 350,000 litres of Naval Distillate Fuel, to be delivered by truck to the CCGS Cygnus.  To be delivered to Newdock, St. John’s Dockyard Limited, estimated for mid-January 2023. \\\n \\\n}
